title: Best Service - Cantus [KONTAKT]
description:
=======[ Info ]======================================================================

Product: Cantus
Vendor: Best Service
Format: Kontakt 5.3
Website: bestservice.de/en/cantus.html

Cantus offers:

- 5 different true Gregorian style legatos (a, e, i, o, u)
- Mmmh articulation
- A powerful word builder with 24 words, 3 different articulations (staccato, fast and slow speeds).
- Words can be split to offer a total of 120 words/syllables
- Words can be combined with true legato playing while the corresponding vowel is automatically selected
- A collection of 20 Gregorian chants splitted into 400 phrases.
- 60 minutes of music
- 19 soundscapes, created from vocal samples.
- 6.000 samples (stereo, 44kHz, 24 bit), Library Size 2.8 GB.
- Free Kontakt Player included (Version 5.3 or higher required)


=======[ Instruction ]===============================================================

For Kontakt 5.3 (and above)

--- [ METHOD I ] ---

- Open Kontakt 5.3 (and above)
- Go to File tab
- Browse for the torrent folder
- Drag n Drop the NKI files into the Right Panel to use.

--- [ METHOD II ] ---

- Go to Library tab
- Click Add Library
- Browse for the library folder's location
- Click Ok/Yes
- Accept or Yes when asked

=======[ Extra ]=====================================================================

I DO NOT OWN THIS PRODUCT - IF YOU ENJOY IT, PLEASE CONSIDER BUYING TO SUPPORT OWNER!
